sections.purpose: To securely store pharmacological agents under controlled conditions.
sections.scope: Applicable to storage of teaching and research drugs in pharmacology.
procedure: Organize drugs by class, potency, and storage requirements.
Label all containers clearly with name, strength, and expiry date.
Maintain a stock register for issue and receipt.
Keep the cabinet locked when not in use.
Inspect stock regularly and separate expired or damaged items.
Clean shelves periodically with appropriate disinfectant.
precautions: Segregate controlled substances in a locked compartment.
Ensure adequate ventilation if volatile solvents are stored.
Follow temperature and light protection requirements on labels.
Dispose of expired drugs according to biohazard and regulatory guidelines.
